holidays.title: World Smile Day
holidays.description: Let's see those pearly whites—it's World Smile Day!

holidays.title: Egypt: Armed Forces Day
holidays.description: Commemorate the history and resilience of the Egyptian people on this special anniversary.

holidays.title: Honduras: Discovery of America Day
holidays.description: Instead of commemorating Columbus' landing, the holiday compels Latin Americans to discover their indigenous heritage.

holidays.title: Inbox Zero Day
holidays.description: Learn how to manage your emails effectively and keep a zero inbox.

holidays.title: Kids Music Day
holidays.description: Strike some melodious notes with your kids while allowing them to soak themselves in music.

holidays.title: Manufacturing Day
holidays.description: Read on for tips to participate in celebrating America's most exceptional minds and machines.

holidays.title: National Badger Day
holidays.description: Show your love and appreciation for this iconic animal this National Badger Day!

holidays.title: National Body Language Day
holidays.description: This National Body Language Day, let’s try and understand each other even better.

holidays.title: National Coaches Day
holidays.description: Let's not forget about the role coaches — play in shaping a young person's life.

holidays.title: National Energy Geek Day
holidays.description: Greenhouses are more than just houses that are painted green. Just ask the energy geeks.

holidays.title: NATIONAL GERMAN-AMERICAN DAY
holidays.description: German immigrants and their descendants have had a massive impact on American culture and history.

holidays.title: National Isabella Day
holidays.description: If you happen to be an Isabella, you are the brightest star today!

holidays.title: National Mad Hatter Day
holidays.description: Grab your horns and party hats because it's time for a very strange celebration.

holidays.title: National Orange Wine Day
holidays.description: Revel in the deliciousness of the ancient yet underrated drink this National Orange Wine Day!

holidays.title: National Plus Size Appreciation Day
holidays.description: When it comes to beauty, one size doesn't fit all.

holidays.title: ​National Transfer Money to Your Daughter Day
holidays.description: You read that right, a day devoted to daughters getting extra pocket money from their parents.

holidays.title: October Liberatory War
holidays.description: The October Liberatory War helped restore the balance of power in the Arab world.

holidays.title: Turkmenistan Earthquake Memorial Day
holidays.description: Let’s remember those who lost their lives in earthquakes throughout history on this memorial day.

holidays.title: World Cerebral Palsy Day
holidays.description: CP is one of the most common physical disabilities affecting the most vulnerable among us — children.

holidays.title: Addison Rae’s Birthday
holidays.description: Originally a dancer, this TikTok star has taken her talent to new heights of fame.

holidays.title: Fannie Lou Hamer’s Birthday
holidays.description: People will never forget this activist for her contributions to black America.

holidays.title: GreekGodx’s Birthday
holidays.description: Greekgodx is a brilliant streamer who grows stronger every day. The sky is the limit!

holidays.title: Joe Goldberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: This renowned photographer travels the world looking for the best shots! Let's celebrate him!

holidays.title: King Badger’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate this impressive social media star, rapper, T.V. personality, and actor.

holidays.title: LeBron James Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits for this young athlete; not even the sky can stop him!

holidays.title: Melanie Robbins’s Birthday
